direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve transferring assets between accounts, though for different types (futures vs. spot).
Both methods involve transferring assets between sub-accounts, though for different purposes (futures vs. general).
Both methods handle futures asset transfers with similar control flows and parameter handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Environment setup is required before performing any asset transfer operations.
Both methods need to verify the status of the transfer operation and handle similar exceptions.
